english.segment1: I'm totally abandoned to You. I'm lost inside the rivers of Your love. I'm swept into the power of Your presence. Drawn toward the whisper of Your voice
english.segment2: Verse 2. I come to You in quiet adoration. And fall before Your feet You are my King. I'm living for the beauty of Your Presence. To behold the glory of Your face
english.segment3: CHORUS. Holy, Worthy, is the Lord. Heaven declares Your Rightousness. Oh God of All Creation. I worship You
english.segment5: Oh when You said 'seek Your face'. My heart said 'Your face I will seek' (2x)
